name: Chiltel
description: Chiltel India, established in 2021 by Mr. Sudarshan Kuumar Raut, is a recognized startup in the Domestic and Commercial Home Appliances sector. Operating both offline and online, we specialize in offering premium services for Deep Freezers, Visi-Coolers, Chest Freezers, Back Bar Freezers, and more. Trusted by the Government of India as a DIIPT-recognized startup, we aim to deliver top-notch services at affordable rates, right at your doorstep.
